website_summaries.verdict: Shabby chic that's well-made and stylish.
pros: We love how the six drawers with aged knobs enhance the look as well as add function
cons: Tabletop wood is soft, so can dent easily

customer_reviews.title: Excitement turned to disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with the look/style of this table... It was the perfect thing for our home. After saving up and discussing it, my husband and I decided to finally buy it. It's extremely heavy/sturdy. However, we discovered that the top is not actual finished wood, it's a cheap plastic-like coating which has started to CHIP OFF after only having it a few days. We have not been overly rough with the table. An expensive table like this one should be able to hold up to a lifetime of simple family dinners. I wish we would have known prior to purchasing and putting hard earned money into a poorly made product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C. Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap!
customer_reviews.text: The table overall is very cute. However do not expect it to last long! I’ve had mine for 6 weeks and the finish is wearing off already in so many places. It looks absolutely horrible. The quality is terrible! Durability is zero!!! Definitely do not purchase this set if you want it to last more than a few weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but easily damaged and poor quality parts
customer_reviews.text: It is a lovely table as long as it is used gingerly. The table top is soft and damages easily, as others have noted. I have a warped screw and a loose table leg. I'm trying to get the appropriate parts to replace it and am having difficulty contacting anyone. I did buy the protection plan for the furniture, and my claim was automatically denied. I'm trying to get information on why and will update the post if I get more information. Given the inconsistency of the parts Ashley uses, I don't think I'd buy from them again, but I certainly wouldn't buy if the warranty won't even cover as much as a table leg.
customer_reviews.author: V Roth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but compliments with this table. The wood is quality, the coating is quality, the quality.... is quality. It’s a gorgeous table. If you’ve been on the fence and have been eyeballing this for a while, just buy it. All of our local stores tried to sell this to us “on sale” for nearly twice the price. You can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Rigel Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Table top chipping
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very pleased with this table, it is very pretty and seemed to be really solid HOWEVER after just a few weeks of us (light use I might add) the top is chipping! Very unhappy with this!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: bigfan

customer_reviews.title: Love the table, delivery not so much!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, but it came with big gouges on the table top. When I pay over $500 of my money for an item I would appreciate it being delivered with no marks or scratches. Very unhappy! Its much to heavy to send back and no guarantees that I wouldn't get something worse!
customer_reviews.author: sheart

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, but came damaged. See Photos. Like the table but this ruins an otherwise nice set. Ordered mataching chairs and a bbench also, so it is more trouble than it's worth to return, but still exttremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this table. Great look. Very easy to assemble. Quick shipping. Great drawers. Very sturdy. Great price. The only thing that might deter some people is that the table is not a smooth top. this doesn’t make a difference for me, but might for some people.
customer_reviews.author: carrie corso

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful table, but only came with a little dents on the edges. Other than that super sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Zora

customer_reviews.title: Same furniture without the sham
customer_reviews.text: Same quality as you can purchase at an Ashley store without the sham of dealing with “sale ending now!!” Easy to assemble and was better priced than if I had purchased locally.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Densmore

customer_reviews.title: This beautiful dining- room table is as solid as they come.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the white stressed wood look, based on how my dining room is set up, and they nailed it. It took some time to get here, but well worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: YlW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and solid. It's going to be a great table. Cream colored paint with texture to wood. 3 drawers on each side of table, great surprise.
customer_reviews.author: PN

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful! We get so many compliments! It’s sturdy and durable as well. It was a breeze to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: VinoRosè

customer_reviews.title: That's the table I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This solid wood antique white table looks so nice in my new house. We love it! It's very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Ondine Ren

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: The table (and chairs) exceeded my expectations! Absolutely beautiful! Very sturdy and solid. The table definitely needs 2 people to lift into the house. But well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cari Bass

customer_reviews.title: Not the right product
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even get a table 😭 I got ugly random chairs! I’m so sad!!
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: Very solid
customer_reviews.text: Need two people to stand table up once together, other than that it was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Finish will wear off quickly
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this table for 2 years now. After about a year the finish started to come off on the textured part of the table from being wiped off. Product is cheap and doesnt hold up well. Drawers are small and dont hold much but do look nice. It was easy to assemble but the first table came with a large hold punctured in the box and scratches to the table.
customer_reviews.author: Layten Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together & a very sturdy table. And it’s BEAUTIFUL. Shipping took forever but very happy with this set
customer_reviews.author: Monique Chenault

customer_reviews.title: Steer clear...poor finish, no warranty support
customer_reviews.text: Bought directly from Ashley so I could be sure I was covered by warranty. Turns out that doesn’t matter. Read the other reviews...the finish started peeling off of the top of this table after a couple of months. Ashley says it’s normal wear and tear. Denied warranty claim. This is happening to too many people to be a coincidence. And Ashley doesn’t have reviews on their own site. Our previous table was almost 20 years old and had perfect finish when we sold it. We didn’t treat this table any differently. Ashley makes expensive junk.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rattenborg

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY AND DURABILITY IS TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have words to express how disappointed I’m with this table. After years I finally decided to buy a nice table and less than two months of use the finish is already wearing off everywhere!! DO NOT BUY THIS! THIS TABLE QUALITY AND DURABILITY IS TERRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Chad del Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Garbage quality finish
customer_reviews.text: This is the single worst piece of furniture I’ve bought in the past ten years. The finish immediately began chipping, but by the time we went to do something about it, the table was out of warranty. The table is not even in the slightest bit water proof. If you have kids and they spill water, it will immediately be absorbed into the table. I’m writing this review as I search Pinterest for ways to cover this monstrosity besides just using a table cloth.
customer_reviews.author: J. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Table concerns
customer_reviews.text: The presentation is beautiful but The top of the table is very cheaply made. The top layer of the table easily chips. Also, the space between the board traps food and it makes difficult to remove crumbs. In other words you can’t easily just take a cloth and clean. The other complaint is the chairs & bench are cheaply padded. I suppose for the $$ it’s still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

product_meta.title: Ashley Furniture Signature Design - Bolanburg Dining Room Table - Antique White
product_meta.description: Color:Antique WhiteEnjoy beautiful cottage style in the classic Boalsburg farmhouse table. With a rustic planked top and six convenient drawers, this table serves up casual with a vintage twist. The gently distressed tabletop creates the perfect spot for an impromptu gathering, with no need to head to the linen closet for extra place settings. Keep placemats, napkins and utensils on hand in the table's six built-in drawers—very practical for any living space.
feature_bullets: RECTANGULAR DINING TABLE: This quaint, vintage-inspired table captivates with its unique two-tone finish. Casual-cool styling is perfect for Sunday breakfast or an impromptu dinner with friends
BEAUTIFULLY CRAFTED: Made of veneers, wood and engineered wood with a weathered oak finished top and antique white finished body. Designed with 6 drawers for convenient dining room storage
CHARMING DETAILS: Gentle distressing and aged drawer knobs create cottage chic appeal. Plus, drawers easily keep place mats, napkins and utensils on hand
PERFECT FOR FAMILIES: This long dining table comfortably seats up to 6 people. Measures 40” W x 72” D x 30.75” H
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions, hardware and tools included. Matching chairs available and sold separately
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget. Since 1945

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars903 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
